actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to establish a preventive health care program within the Veterans' Administration.

summary.text: Establishes a ten-year program of preventive health care services within the Veterans' Administration. Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to design and conduct a health maintenance pilot program to demonstrate the medical advantages and cost-effectiveness of providing such services to veterans.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to establish a preventive health care program within the Veterans' Administration.
